607    public LineItemBuilder custom(@Nullable final com.commercetools.api.models.type.CustomFields custom) {
608        this.custom = custom;
609        return this;
610    }
611
612    /**
613     *  <p>Inventory mode specific to the line item only, valid for the entire <code>quantity</code> of the line item. Only present if inventory mode is different from the <code>inventoryMode</code> specified on the Cart.</p>
614     */
615
616    public LineItemBuilder inventoryMode(
617            @Nullable final com.commercetools.api.models.cart.InventoryMode inventoryMode) {
618        this.inventoryMode = inventoryMode;
619        return this;
620    }
621
622    /**
623     *  <p>Container for line item specific address(es).</p>
624     */
625
626    public LineItemBuilder shippingDetails(
627            Function<com.commercetools.api.models.cart.ItemShippingDetailsBuilder, com.commercetools.api.models.cart.ItemShippingDetailsBuilder> builder) {
628        this.shippingDetails = builder.apply(com.commercetools.api.models.cart.ItemShippingDetailsBuilder.of()).build();
629        return this;
630    }
631
632    /**
633     *  <p>Container for line item specific address(es).</p>
634     */
635
636    public LineItemBuilder shippingDetails(
637            @Nullable final com.commercetools.api.models.cart.ItemShippingDetails shippingDetails) {
638        this.shippingDetails = shippingDetails;
639        return this;
640    }
641
642    /**
643     *  <p>The date when the LineItem was last modified by one of the following actions setLineItemShippingDetails, addLineItem, removeLineItem, or changeLineItemQuantity. Optional only for backwards compatible reasons. When the LineItem is created lastModifiedAt is set to addedAt.</p>
644     */
645
646    public LineItemBuilder lastModifiedAt(@Nullable final java.time.ZonedDateTime lastModifiedAt) {
647        this.lastModifiedAt = lastModifiedAt;
648        return this;
649    }

761
762    public LineItem build() {
763        Objects.requireNonNull(id, LineItem.class + ": id is missing");
764        Objects.requireNonNull(productId, LineItem.class + ": productId is missing");
765        Objects.requireNonNull(name, LineItem.class + ": name is missing");
766        Objects.requireNonNull(productType, LineItem.class + ": productType is missing");
767        Objects.requireNonNull(variant, LineItem.class + ": variant is missing");
768        Objects.requireNonNull(price, LineItem.class + ": price is missing");
769        Objects.requireNonNull(taxedPricePortions, LineItem.class + ": taxedPricePortions is missing");
770        Objects.requireNonNull(totalPrice, LineItem.class + ": totalPrice is missing");
771        Objects.requireNonNull(quantity, LineItem.class + ": quantity is missing");
772        Objects.requireNonNull(state, LineItem.class + ": state is missing");
773        Objects.requireNonNull(perMethodTaxRate, LineItem.class + ": perMethodTaxRate is missing");
774        Objects.requireNonNull(discountedPricePerQuantity, LineItem.class + ": discountedPricePerQuantity is missing");
775        Objects.requireNonNull(priceMode, LineItem.class + ": priceMode is missing");
776        Objects.requireNonNull(lineItemMode, LineItem.class + ": lineItemMode is missing");
777        return new LineItemImpl(id, productId, productKey, name, productSlug, productType, variant, price, taxedPrice,
778            taxedPricePortions, totalPrice, quantity, addedAt, state, taxRate, perMethodTaxRate, supplyChannel,
779            distributionChannel, discountedPricePerQuantity, priceMode, lineItemMode, custom, inventoryMode,
780            shippingDetails, lastModifiedAt);
781    }
782
783    /**
784     * builds LineItem without checking for non null required values
785     */
786    public LineItem buildUnchecked() {
787        return new LineItemImpl(id, productId, productKey, name, productSlug, productType, variant, price, taxedPrice,
788            taxedPricePortions, totalPrice, quantity, addedAt, state, taxRate, perMethodTaxRate, supplyChannel,
789            distributionChannel, discountedPricePerQuantity, priceMode, lineItemMode, custom, inventoryMode,
790            shippingDetails, lastModifiedAt);
791    }
792
793    public static LineItemBuilder of() {
794        return new LineItemBuilder();
795    }
796
797    public static LineItemBuilder of(final LineItem template) {
798        LineItemBuilder builder = new LineItemBuilder();
799        builder.id = template.getId();
800        builder.productId = template.getProductId();
801        builder.productKey = template.getProductKey();
802        builder.name = template.getName();
803        builder.productSlug = template.getProductSlug();
804        builder.productType = template.getProductType();
805        builder.variant = template.getVariant();
806        builder.price = template.getPrice();
807        builder.taxedPrice = template.getTaxedPrice();
808        builder.taxedPricePortions = template.getTaxedPricePortions();
809        builder.totalPrice = template.getTotalPrice();
810        builder.quantity = template.getQuantity();
811        builder.addedAt = template.getAddedAt();
812        builder.state = template.getState();
813        builder.taxRate = template.getTaxRate();
814        builder.perMethodTaxRate = template.getPerMethodTaxRate();
815        builder.supplyChannel = template.getSupplyChannel();
816        builder.distributionChannel = template.getDistributionChannel();
817        builder.discountedPricePerQuantity = template.getDiscountedPricePerQuantity();
818        builder.priceMode = template.getPriceMode();
819        builder.lineItemMode = template.getLineItemMode();
820        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
821        builder.inventoryMode = template.getInventoryMode();
822        builder.shippingDetails = template.getShippingDetails();
823        builder.lastModifiedAt = template.getLastModifiedAt();
824        return builder;
825    }

827}
